about_the_game:
In the Pipe DLC sequel, you can expect the same amazing features as in the previous installment, such as:

A new level with new traps

Continuation of the main character's story

Improved level designs

An unexpected ending that will surely catch you off guard


In this DLC, you'll have the chance to uncover a mysterious ending that will conclude your journey with the main character in an unexpected way. It will undoubtedly be one of the most exciting things you can experience in the game.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to continue your adventure with the Pipe DLC sequel and experience a new and surprising story. Buy now and get ready for another unforgettable journey!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6200
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8200M G
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
